channel.title: Cosmo - an art project in the spirit of a love letter to my son - will produce 21 works of art (reflecting his 21yrs of life) to be presented to him on the night of his 21st birthday. This site will journal the production of these works of art and record the thoughts of his father and those collaborating on the project throughout its creation.
channel.description: Cosmo - an art project in the spirit of a love letter to my son - will produce 21 works of art (reflecting his 21yrs of life) to be presented to him on the night of his 21st birthday. This site will journal the production of these works of art and record the thoughts of his father and those collaborating on the project throughout its creation.
